Articles.Content:
Hi, this is my very first post. Before now, I was a forum ghost, whispering through the topics. Anyway, I have created a new modded series which is quite balanced. I still need a few bug fixes, but other that that, it is fairing swimmingly. If any modders could help, that would be great! My Mod List is very long. How do I get this to stop being a link? Anyway, here's My video, Enjoy!

 

Reserved for more stuffs
Good! I suggest getting a better title name than KSP series ep 1. Instead like KSP modded episode 1 insert extra thing here like: First flight! Just a little thing you could change.
